name: Optimize Codons for Heterologous Expression
description: Analyzes and optimizes a DNA/RNA sequence for improved expression in a heterologous host organism
author: Biomni Synthetic Biology Tools

inputs.name: target_sequence
inputs.description: The DNA or RNA sequence of the target gene to be optimized. Should contain complete codons (length divisible by 3)

inputs.name: host_codon_usage
inputs.description: Dictionary mapping codons to their usage frequency in the host organism. Format: {'AUG': 0.8, 'GCC': 0.6, ...}

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Research log summarizing the optimization process and results
